title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Created CI/CD workflows with Jenkins, leveraging environment variables instead of multiple Jenkinsfiles.
Managed virtualized environments with ESXi, vCenter, Pulumi for IaaC, and Ansible for CaaC.
Implemented GitOps workflows with Netbox as the Single Source of Truth, utilizing Jenkins for CI, and Ansible for streamlined deployment processes.
Automated the configuration generation for HAProxy, BIND9, Prometheus, and various other infrastructure tools from Netbox using GitOps Flow, storing the new configs in a Git repository, and deploying them to servers.
Developed an Internal Development Portal (IDP) for developers, utilizing Jenkins Forms for request submission and Jenkins Webhooks to automate pipeline triggers, enhancing efficiency in development workflows.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Developed dynamic CI/CD pipelines using GitLab for diverse projects.
Automated VM management with ESXi, vCenter, and Terraform.
Implemented Ansible for efficient VM configuration.
Implemented GitOps workflows for seamless deployment.
Integrated Elastic APM and Sentry for comprehensive application monitoring.
Managed logs efficiently using Elastic Stack.
Monitored server and cluster metrics with Prometheus and Grafana.
Ensured High Availability (HA) across Three Datacenters for production.
Configured Kubernetes cluster for streamlined testing and future production migration.

title: Software Consultant
description:
Advised the Product Owner on converting ideas into technical specifications.
Provided development consulting to the technical team, helping them choose the best architectures based on their needs for Spring Boot projects.
Assisted in the migration to microservices.
Designed Adobe XD prototypes for Android applications.
Collaborated with the technical team to design database schemas.

title: Development Consultant
description:
Created user interface designs and animations.
Provided consulting on Android project architecture using MVVM.
Implemented smooth UI animations.

title: Android Developer
description:
Collaborated to improve performance and fix existing bugs in the Delino application.
Implemented new features and functionalities in the Delino application.

title: Software Developer
description:
Implemented a business management system using Angular and .NET Core.
Developed a two-dimensional mesh designer Windows application.
Created an internet speed testing Android application for Irancell.
Upgraded the BYD S6 Karmania car multimedia system.
Completed various other applications for businesses and startups.

title: Android and C# Developer
description:
Developed software locks and in-app payment systems for Android applications.
Created a Windows package builder for tutorial video packages, including integrated software locks.
Implemented web-based admin panels to manage activation codes and track activated devices.
